header.gameNote: DICK'S SPORTING GOODS NIT SEASON TIP-OFF

article.headline: Florida Atlantic 65, Santa Clara 61
article.story: TUCSON, Ariz. -- Shavar Richardson scored 17 points to lead Florida Atlantic to a 65-61 victory over Santa Clara in the consolation round of the NIT Season Tip-Off on Tuesday night. Carderro Nwoji scored 12 points, including the clinching free throws, for the Owls (2-1). John Bryant had 25 points, seven rebounds and two blocked shots for the Broncos (1-2). There were four lead changes in the final two minutes. Bryant hit a hook shot to give the Broncos a 58-57 lead with 1:50 to play. FAU's Paul Graham III answered with a three-point play to give the Owls a 60-58 lead. After freshman James Rahon hit a 3-pointer to put Santa Clara up by a point, Graham connected from beyond the arc to give the Owls a 63-61 lead with 22 seconds left. Brett Royster blocked Bryant's shot with 8 seconds left, and Nwoji hit two free throws to seal it.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.
